data.name: Du assault Sp Hon
data.desc: Buccaneers or privateers attempt twice to sack Sp galleons at Sto Tomás de Castillo
data.prim_n: Mus Nav Navarrete vol 23 ff 226-[missg] [a 28 jun 1606]
data.note: Possibly see 1607 Mauricio de Nasau assaults Truxillo / 1607 Pirates assault Puerto Caballos / 1613 Truxillo assaulted by Pirates, during which Alcalde of Truxillo dies /v Lujan 2 824
